precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: The Start Menu will open, displaying program shortcuts and system options.

precondition: The Windows XP 'Start' menu is open and the mouse cursor is hovering over the 'Control Panel' option.
action: Click the 'Control Panel' option in the Start menu.
expected_results: The Start menu will close and the Control Panel window will open.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open and in Category view.
expected_results: The "Appearance and Themes" category will open.

precondition: The "Appearance and Themes" window is open within the Windows XP Control Panel. The right side of the window should display the "or pick a Control Panel icon" section.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will open, covering the "Appearance and Themes" window. The "Display Properties" window will display the "Themes," "Desktop," "Screen Saver," "Appearance," and "Settings" tabs.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab is open in the 'Display Properties' window.
action: Click the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu and select '[None]'.
expected_results: The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu will display '[None]' and the 'Wait' duration arrows will disappear.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab of the "Display Properties" window is open. The "Power..." button is visible at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open. The window will display the active power scheme and monitor turn-off settings.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown menu next to "Turn off monitor".
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear with a list of selectable time intervals.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu will display "Never" as the selected option.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open.
expected_results: The "Power schemes" dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of available power schemes.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power schemes" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the "Always On" option in the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Power schemes" dropdown menu will show "Always On" as the selected power scheme.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown menu next to "Turn off hard disks."
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time intervals to choose from.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Always On" power scheme is selected and the "Apply" button is highlighted.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close. The dropdown menus for "Turn off hard disks", "System standby", and "System hibernates" will change from "After 20 mins" to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "System hibernates" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click on the "Never" option in the "System hibernates" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates" dropdown menu will close and display "Never".

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Screen Saver" tab selected. The mouse cursor is hovering over the "OK" button.
action: Click on an empty area of the "Display Properties" window.
expected_results: The mouse cursor will move away from the "OK" button.

action: Click the 'X' button in the top right corner of the "Display Properties" window.
